embeds.title: Arena battle time limit
description<text>: • Each arena battle has a time limit of 2 minutes and 30 seconds.
• If the server doesn't receive the battle result in 5 minutes for any reason, the server will rule that the defender wins.

fields.name: Grim Reaper
value<text>: • If a battle does not end after 2 minutes of fighting, Grim Reaper will come to the battlefield.
• When the Grim Reaper appears, all units will lose 10% of their maximum life every second.
• Grim Reaper will ignore any damage immunity.

fields.name: Network error / game crash
value<text>: • If a battle ends but fails to connect to the server due to network error, the player can try to reconnect to the server.
• If the server does not receive the battle result 5 minutes after the start of battle (due to game crashing or unresolved network error), the server will rule that the defender wins the battle.
• This mechanism was implemented to address a past abuse where players would intentionally quit battles to avoid losses.
